logSummary: v0.1.1 2022.3.18 1. 修复 收藏(最爱)的播放列表导致的崩溃 2. 修复 更新日志夜间模式失效 3. 修复 快捷添加黑名单后卡死 4. 新增 直接重置媒体库类别的设置条目 5. 新增 分离简体中文和英语的更新日志与更新提示弹窗 6. 改进 作者信息与翻译入口 1. Fix: crashes caused by the favorite playlist 2. Fix: changelog's night mode not working 3. Fix: it gets stuck after adding a blacklist via shortcut 4. Add: a setting entry for directly resetting the media library category 5. Add: split changelog and update popup into Simplified Chinese version and English version 6. Improve: author information and translation entrance in About
